name: Ghosts of Darkness
description:
You are being attacked by ghosts in a dark, empty room. Shoot your weapon to see what's around you and take the ghosts out before they reach you. When the ghosts are shot, they leave behind a tombstone. How long can you last before you are overrun by the ghosts?

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Press or hold space to shoot

Mouse - Move the mouse to aim

M - Mute the music
